WRITING.TITLE: I hate this new buzzword term "live service"
WRITING.TEXT:
Ive heard it a few times recently for games. Is this really what people want for most games? I understand for games like fifa or madden where online and keeping up to date is a huge service but most games dont need that crap.
Whats worse is, some of the more mediocre games of recent times (division, wild lands, destiny) have not only had this "online service" thing baked in, but also sold brilliantly.

WRITING.TITLE: Anyone read aliens bug hunt?
WRITING.TEXT: Bout halfway thru. Gotta say Im disappointed. Some decent stories, some bad ones (the burke one was wtf). Too many non xeno stories, and too much reliance on the movie characters. I was hoping for different aliens vs marines encounters across the movies time spans.
